hero.title: Space-grade privacy for AI workflows.

products.label: Products
products.title: Designed for local AI teams.
products.captionDesc: Cantonese captions with Traditional Chinese output, speaker-aware transcripts, and SRT export.
products.minutesDesc: Meeting minutes with speaker ID, clean transcripts, and AI summaries.
products.codeDesc: Low-cost Claude Code or Codex access with team controls and audit-ready usage.

pricing.premiumDesc: All-in-one plan. Buy me a dinner.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: Custom security reviews and dedicated deployment support.
